makerbit.getUltrasonicDistance:
Measures the distance and returns the result in a range from 1 to 300 centimeters or up to 118 inch.
The maximum value is returned to indicate when no object was detected.
makerbit.getUltrasonicDistance|param|ech: Pin connected to echo, eg: MakerBitPin.P8
makerbit.getUltrasonicDistance|param|tri: pin connected to trig, eg: MakerBitPin.P5
